Question: Shenzhen Transtyle Electronics Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Transtyle Electronics Co., Ltd

Product: Consumer electronics products

- Specializes in Bluetooth earphones, TWS, and Bluetooth speakers
- Manufacturing capacity of 200,000 pieces monthly, compliant with CE, FCC, BQB, and RoHS standards
- Senior management with over 10 years of OEM and ODM experience
- Strong focus on R&D and innovation
- Offers services for ID design, PCDB development, rapid prototyping, and production control systems
- Located at 4rd Floor, Building F, Chudong Technology Park, 57# Shaxin Road, Tangxia Town, Dongguan City, Guangdong, China
